00020 #ifndef _PASSENGER_BUCKET_H_
00021 #define _PASSENGER_BUCKET_H_
00022 
00023 /**
00024  * apr_bucket_pipe closes a pipe's file descriptor when it has reached end-of-stream,
00025  * but not when an error has occurred. That behavior conflicts with Phusion Passenger's
00026  * file descriptor management code.
00027  *
00028  * passenger_bucket is like apr_bucket_pipe, but never closes the pipe's file descriptor.
00029  * It also ignores the APR_NONBLOCK_READ because that's known to cause strange
00030  * I/O problems.
00031  */
00032 
00033 #include "apr_buckets.h"
00034 
00035 apr_bucket *passenger_bucket_create(apr_file_t *pipe, apr_bucket_alloc_t *list);
00036 
00037 #endif /* _PASSENGER_BUCKET_H_ */
00038
